title: 469.0171 HOUSING PLAN, PROGRAM, AND REVIEW.
text: Prior to the issuance of bonds or obligations for a housing development project proposed by an authority under section 469.017, the authority shall prepare and submit for review a program as defined in section 462C.02, subdivision 3, in the manner provided in sections 462C.04, subdivision 2, and 462C.05, subdivision 5, for the making or purchasing of loans by cities.
